entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -25.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 7:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -25.4°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -28.3°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 27 except minus 31 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27 except minus 31 inland. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm south of Port Hope Simpson. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
